name: clooneyjs
description: Clooney is an actor library for the web

scripts.test: npm run linter && npm run build && npm run unittest
scripts.mypublish: npm run build && npm run test && cp README.md package.json dist && npm publish dist
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && npm run compile && npm run minify
scripts.minify: cat licenseheader.txt > dist/clooney.min.js && babel-minify --mangle dist/clooney.js >> dist/clooney.min.js && cat licenseheader.txt > dist/clooney.bundle.min.js && babel-minify --mangle dist/clooney.bundle.js >> dist/clooney.bundle.min.js
